import React, { useState } from 'react' import {AiOutlineCamera} from 'react-icons/ai' import {BsCardImage} from 'react-icons/bs'; import styles from './EditModal.module.css' const EditModal = ({user}) => { const [form,setForm] = useState({ username: user.username, tel: user.tel, gender: user.gender, address: user.address, bio: user.bio, avatar: user.avatar, background: user.background }); const inputChangeHandler = e => { setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name] :e.target.value }) } return (
Edit Profile
Change Avatar
Change Background
Cancel
Submit
) } export default EditModal
